archimate:Node.name: Datadistributiesysteem
archimate:Node.documentation: Een systeem dat het synchroniseren van masterdata ondersteunt.

properties.value: Talend MDM (http://www.talend.com/products/mdm), SAP NetWeaver Master Data Management (http://www1.sap.com/platform/netweaver/components/mdm/index.epx), IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management (http://www-03.ibm.com/software/products/us/en/infosphere-master-data-management), Informatica Master Data Management (http://www.informatica.com/us/products/master-data-management/mdm/)
